titleStmt.title: A ryght delectable treatyse upon a goodly garlande or chapelet of laurell by mayster Skelton poete laureat studyously dyuysed at Sheryshotton Castell. In ye foreste of galtres, where in ar co[m]prysyde many [et] dyuers colacyons [et] ryght pregnant allectyues of syngular pleasure, as more at large it doth apere in ye pees folowynge
titleStmt.author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529.

titleStmt.title: A ryght delectable treatyse upon a goodly garlande or chapelet of laurell by mayster Skelton poete laureat studyously dyuysed at Sheryshotton Castell. In ye foreste of galtres, where in ar co[m]prysyde many [et] dyuers colacyons [et] ryght pregnant allectyues of syngular pleasure, as more at large it doth apere in ye pees folowynge
titleStmt.author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Imprynted by me Rychard faukes dwelling in durarent or els in Powlis chyrche yarde at the sygne of the A.B.C.,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our lorde god.M.CCCCC.xxiii. The iii. day of Octobre] [1523]
